title: Hangman game
description: This is a simple word game. The objective is to guess the word, within a certain number of guesses. Player can enter any number of letters at once. Each time the wrong letter is given, one fragment of the hangman diagram is drawn. I made it in JavaScript and Sass. I also used Pug for writing markup and Npm Scripts to automate develoment tasks.

title: Porftolio
description: I built this site to show off my sweet skills!

title: Andrzej KÄ™dzierski website
description: Website created for a musician and music producer from Tricity. It is build with responsiveness in mind. In this project I used SCSS with BEM for writing CSS and Gulp to automate workflow.

title: Yoga Palace website
description: Responsive website build with Pug, Sass + BEM, and Js. I used Npm Scripts to run developmnet tasks.

title: Oxford timer
description: This is my first project, build with HTML, CSS and Javascript. It is a timer counting down the time until the end of speech in the Oxford debate.
